content: Hi, should the list of features here https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/8d2d0014922e9f541694bfe87642749239990e0e/compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/target_features.rs#L35 match the list of features you can pass with -C target-feature?
(Because I wanted to enable pan, with #[target_feature(enable = "pan")], but you can't
